**As a** [analyst]  
 **I need** [insert an ID]  
 **So that** [I get tweets geolocation]  
   
 ### Details and Assumptions
 * [batchgeo plugin needed]
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Given [I ahve a twitter list]
 When [when I insert the ID]
 Then [the app generates a map]
